WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please use search function this has been reported before.
WorkItem.Description: The quest rewards from handing in the Head of Onyxia are not unique, they do not need to be as the head can only be handed in once, but this creates an issue for Rawr. I have a Polished Dragonslayer's Signet and when I select it in the optimizer, it suggests that I equip 2, obviously not possible. Easily fixed manually, but confused the hell outta me when I saw it at first :P
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Head of Onyxia loot not unique

Comments.Message: I did use the search function, only thing that came up for searching "Onyxia" was this post: http://rawr.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=13905 , and this particular issue was not mentioned.

http://rawr.codeplex.com/Thread/List.aspx?SearchText=onyxia

It was under Discussions.  Unfortunately, the Discussions and Issues are two totally separate entities, so you need to run the same search string through both to catch everything. :/
Oh! Didn't know that :S Thanks for the help, will search both places next time :D
